Class Atomics

public final class Atomics
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility methods pertaining to classes in the java.util.concurrent.atomic package.

    10.0
    Author:
    Kurt Alfred Kluever

      static <E extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>

      • newReferenceArray

        public static <E extends @Nullable java.lang.Object> java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceArray<E> newReferenceArray​(E[] array)
        Creates an AtomicReferenceArray instance with the same length as, and all elements copied from, the given array.

        Returns:
